Source.Name: libxpm
Source.Summary: X Pixmap (XPM) image file format library
Source.Description: libXpm provides support and common operation for the XPM pixmap format, which is commonly used in legacy X applications. XPM is an extension of the monochrome XBM bitmap specificied in the X protocol.

Package.Name: libxpm

Package.Description: libXpm provides support and common operation for the XPM pixmap format, which is commonly used in legacy X applications. XPM is an extension of the monochrome XBM bitmap specificied in the X protocol.
